div.p: SPENT TIME THERE, NO DOUBT ABOUT IT.
DON'T MESS AROUND IN SINGAPORE.
AND FINALLY, TONIGHT, THE FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY.
BE CAUTIOUS, AS WE SAID, IN THE TALKING POINTS MEMO WITH
THE INTERNET. WHENEVER YOU HEAR SOMEBODY SAY
THEY LEARNED SOMETHING FROM THE NET, BE VERY SKEPTICAL.
REMEMBER, THERE ARE NO STANDARDS IN CYBERSPACE,
ANYTHING GOES. LET ME INTRODUCE YOU TO BENJI,
WHO IS HE? WRITES FOR A SITE TALKING
POINTS MEMO AND STOLE FROM ME AND HE TOLD THE WORLD, QUOTE,
O'REILLY GOT INTO AN ON AIR SCREAMING MATCH WHETHER TO
BLAME DRUNK DRIVING DEATHS ON ILLEGAL IMMIGRATION.
THAT'S A COMPLETE LIE. EVERYBODY'S SEEN THAT CHAT I
HAD WITH RIVERA. AND IT WAS ABOUT ILLEGAL ALIEN
CRIME, VIOLENT CRIME. THAT'S WHAT IT WAS ABOUT.
SO, BENJI KNOWS THAT, BUT HE'S LYING.
NOW, WE POLITELY ASKED THE WEBSITE TO CORRECT THE RECORD.
THEY REFUSED AND WHY SHOULD THEY CORRECT THE RECORD?
THEY ANSWER TO NOBODY. IN FACT, THE TIP OF THE DAY,
BE SKEPTICAL OF THE NET, ESPECIALLY WHEN ARTICLES ARE
WRITTEN BY A GUY NAMED BENJI. THE DOG IS OKAY.
THAT'S IT FOR US TONIGHT. CHECK OUT FOX NEWS FACTOR
